amendment.description: An amendment printed in Part C of House Report 108-497 and considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 645. The amendment corrects a drafting error which resulted in the bill mistakenly being reported with an incorrect short title in section 1. Clarifies the short title of the Act shall be the `Occupational Safety and Health Small Employer Access to Justice Act of 2004'.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 645.
